message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but $9,000 is too low for me.  Could you do $13,000?
I appreciate your understanding, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. Is that something you'd consider?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. How about we split the difference again and land at $11,750? This reflects how valuable this product is while acknowledging your budget.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $11,750 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
